description:
Soun Tendo anxiously awaits the return of his friend’s son, Ranma Saotome, who is betrothed to his daughter, Akane Tendo, from China. On the day they were to meet, a cute girl with pigtails and a giant panda appeared instead!? It turns out that during their training, the Saotome family had fallen into the cursed springs of the legendary training grounds known as “Jusenkyo.” When splashed with water, Ranma transforms into a girl and his father, Genma, turns into a panda!
Source: Official English Website
